String HttpSocket::ConvertFromHtml (  const String &  str  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Converts an URL string to a 'normal' string. E.g. 'Hello20user!' will be converted to 'Hello user!'.

Parameters:
str An URL type string.
Returns:
A 'normal' string.

Converts a hex character to its numerical representation, e.g. 'A' will return 10.

BOOLEAN HttpSocket::SendResponse (  HttpResponse &  httpResponse  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Sends the content of an HttpResponse object to the client. (Internally enqueues the response to eventually previously occured responses and sends the responses one after the other.)

Parameters:
httpResponse The object with the data to send.
